data.eml:eml: Two new species of Ampithoidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from northeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Andrade, Luiz F., Senna, André R. (2017): Two new species of Ampithoidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4282 (3): 487-500, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4282.3.4
